Override.entitydescription.scp_firelatexhot: A sample of Ignis Latex which has been modified to further enhance it's exothermic reaction, causing severe burns within seconds after contact with skin.
Override.entitydescription.scp_replicatinglatexre: A sample of Preso Latex which has been chemically modified to take advantage of Preso latex's mutagenic properties, directly counteracting any Preso Latex reactions alongside partially inverting celluar atrophy caused by Ionizing Radiation.
Override.entitydescription.scp_concoction: A syringe containing a mixture of Morbusine, Radiotoxin and Sufforin, capable of inflicting a horrendous death upon an individual you are especially not fond of in addition to being difficult to remediate. This practice of combining toxins is outlawed due to the intense degree of suffering it causes to an individual.
Override.entitydescription.scp_vodka: A bottle of high quality ethanol that should be used in small doses as a result of its potency. It is capable of flushing out free-radicals and poisons from the circulatory system as veins and arteries vasolidate.
Override.entitydescription.scp_pomegrenadedrink: A bottle of Pomegrenade juice and Condensed Ethanol, providing an excellent drink for thirsty submariners who want a quick break from something.
Override.entitydescription.scp_condensedstabilozi: An autoinjector containing Anabolic Steroids and high levels of Stabilozine for use against most poisons and minor radiation exposure. It features a multi-stage injection system allowing for multiple small doses, though is liable to fail due to being fairly experimental.
Override.entitydescription.scp_devilsblood: A syringe of processed Sulphuric Acid and Ignis Latex that actively liquefies organic tissues and causes massive internal haemorrhaging. This process as expected is excruciatingly painful and traumatic for the victim.
Override.entitydescription.scp_wastingdiseasesyri: A syringe containing a poorly understood neurodegenerative prion disease commonly found dormant within various Europan creatures. These prions are activated through stimulating alien blood with the highly mutagenic Preso Latex and Sufforin, allowing for the proteins to misfold and become malignant.
Override.entitydescription.scp_wastingdiseasecure: A syringe predominantly containing Stabilozine, capable of neutralising the malignant protein structures responsible for SWD.
Override.entitydescription.scp_lineavirussyringe: A syringe containing an extremely contagious specimen of an airborne and waterborne virus that has been identified since humanity arrived, primarily affecting the respiratory and gastrointestinal system. Using Sufforin and Preso Latex as a potent activating agent, this specimen is ready for use in biological warfare. CBRN protection will be mandatory once this begins to spread.
Override.entitydescription.scp_lineaviruscure: A syringe predominantly containing Stabilozine and ABX, capable of dissolving the protein coating of the lineavirus virions and allowing fast recovery in addition to temporary immunity.
Override.entitydescription.scp_volatilereplicatin: A highly unstable form of Preso Latex that readily and spotaneously attempts to react with any organic tissue within close proximity of itself. Holding onto this for a long period of time is highly discouraged.
Override.entitydescription.scp_psyblock: A set of pills designed to protect against various mental ailments and the mysterious electromagnetic radiation emitting from Alien Ruins.
Override.entitydescription.suture:
Stitches up surgical incisions.
On Use: ‖color:243,162,50,255‖-100% Surgical Incision‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.scalpel:
Can make very precise cuts, perfect for surgery.
On Use: ‖color:243,162,50,255‖+100% Surgical Incision‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.tweezers:
Allows the retrieval of a variety foreign objects through incisions. Mostly bullets though.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-30% Gunshot Wound‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+4% Blood Loss‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+2% Bleeding‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Requires an open surgical incision)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.meddegree: A reminder of the good times you had before your medical license was revoked.
Override.entitydescription.surgeryscissors:
Can make very precise snips, perfect for liberating someone of their organs.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-20% Organ Damage‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+9% Missing Organs‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+8% Blood Loss‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+4% Bleeding‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Requires an open surgical incision)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.humanorgan:
An organ, of a human. ‖color:245,105,105,255‖Edible when processed.‖color:end‖
When implanted via surgery: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-10% Missing Organs‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.basebionic:
A bionic contraption to mimic the function of a normal human organ, can be used to replace missing organs.
When implanted via surgery: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-10% Missing Organs‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+9% Organ Rejection‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced and harmful effects increased if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.humanflesh:
A flesh sample of the human species.
When eaten: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-30% Flesh Withdrawal‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+15% Flesh Addiction‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.surgeryimplant:
An implant that triggers the production of hormones like adrenaline to aid surgery when not in a medical bed or anesthized.
When implanted via surgery: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖Allows surgery to be performed without ether tanks or a surgical bed. Allows self surgery.‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.addictionimplant:
A one-use implant that reprograms the brain to lose its dependence on any drugs.
When implanted via surgery: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-100% All Addictions‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-100% All Overdoses‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.omnizine:
A medicine capable of healing multiple internal injuries and burns at once.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-50% Damage‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-50% Organ Damage‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-50% Burns‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-50% Organ Rejection‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.calomel:
An aggressive purging agent designed to rid of poisons in early stages.
On Use: ‖color:245,105,105,255‖-60% All Buffs‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖-30% Slow Metabolism‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-10% Drunk ‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-100% Poison (if below 15%) ‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.heparin:
An anti-coagulant for dealing with blood clots.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-1200% Blood Clot‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(No healing if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.proconvertin:
A coagulant that helps heal bleeding wounds faster.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-100% Surgical Incision‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-5% Bleeding‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+3% Blood Clot ‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced and harmful effects increased if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.stypticpowder:
A powder designed to heal brute force and deep tissue injuries.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-60% Blunt Force Trauma‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-60% Deep Tissue Injury‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-30% Internal Damage‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.concentratedants:
A bunch of ants in a syringe; often used as a torture method
‖color:154,213,163,255‖+100% Ants‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(No skill requirement.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.anticide:
A pesticide designed specifically for ants.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-300% Ants‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+15% Burns‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.autosurgeon:
An automated device that complete surgeries very quickly. Not exactly efficient, using it's entire internal battery content for a single use; suggested only to be used in an emergency event. Recharges when a battery is placed inside it.
‖color:243,162,50,255‖Effects depend on contained items.‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.surgeonprogrambullet:
Datachip containing autosurgeon instructions for the removal of a bullet lodged in the body.
On Autosurgeon Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-30% Gunshot Wound‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.surgeonprogramorgan:
Datachip containing autosurgeon instructions for the removal of a organ, primarily for transplant reasons.
On Autosurgeon Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-20% Organ Damage‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.antibloodloss1:
A sodium chloride infusion mildly useful in the treatment of blood loss.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-25% Blood Loss‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.antibloodloss2:
A pack of blood substitute for the treatment of blood loss.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-120% Blood Loss‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.deusizine:
A highly potent stimulant effective in the treatment of internal damage, oxygen deprivation and, to a lesser extent, blood loss. Produces mild burns as a side effect.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-40% Damage‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-5% Oxygen Low/s ~ 20s‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+10% Burns‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced and harmful effects increased if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.pomegrenadeextract:
Concentrated pomegrenade juice mixed with a very small amount of more expensive medicinal compounds. ‖color:245,105,105,255‖A label on the side warns not to take more than 2.‖color:end‖
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-15% Damage‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+3% Oxygen Low/s ~ 60s‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced and harmful effects increased if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.antibleeding1:
Basic bandages, useful in the treatment of bleeding wounds, burns and certain surface injuries.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-40% Bleeding‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-30% Bite Wounds‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-30% Lacerations‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-20% Burns‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.antibleeding2:
A synthetic skin with hemostatic properties, able to quickly seal most wounds.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-50% Bleeding‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-40% Bite Wounds‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-40% Lacerations‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-40% Burns‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.calyxanide:
An antiparasitic drug used in the treatment of husk parasite infections. Might require higher dosage to cure the infection at later stages.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-100% Husk Infection‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.antibiotics:
An aggressive antibiotic that acts against a wide range of disease-causing bacteria, though with the side effect of moderate organ damage in the process.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-30% Husk Infection‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-0.25% Husk Infection/s ~ 120s‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-60% Infected Wound‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖+600% Husk Infection Resistance‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+15% Organ Damage‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+10% Organ Damage‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced and harmful effects increased if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.meth:
A potent nervous system stimulant.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖+420% Hyperactivity‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-30% Meth Withdrawal‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+5% Meth Addiction‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+6% Organ Damage‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Buff reduced and harmful effects increased if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.steroids:
Temporarily increases muscular strength and physical performance.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖+420% Vigor‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-3% Oxygen low/s 60s ‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-30% Steroid Withdrawal‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+5% Steroid Addiction‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+60% Psychosis‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Buff reduced and harmful effects increased if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.hyperzine:
An extremely potent muscle stimulant for those moments when you gotta go fast.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖+400% Vigor‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖+400% Hyperactivity‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-5% Oxygen low/s 60s ‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-24% Meth + Steroid Withdrawal‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+4% Meth + Steroid Addiction‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+20% Psychosis‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Buff reduced and harmful effects increased if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.combatstimulantsyringe:
A highly advanced stimulant that makes the user rapidly recover from physical injuries and bloodloss.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖+75% Combat Stimulant‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+25% Combat Stimulant Overdose‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+20% Chem Addiction‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Buff reduced and harmful effects increased if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.antirad:
Slows down cellular degradation caused by radiation.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-100% Radiation Sickness‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.stabilozine:
Used as an ingredient in the manufacture of various medicines. On its own, can be used to slow down the effects of most toxins.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-120% Organ Rejection‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-1% Poison/s ~ 30s‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.feniternerveagentcure:
Pralidoxime Chloride/Atropine, used to treat nerve agent exposure.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-120% Nerve Agent Exposure‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖+180% Hallucinating‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+18% Organ Damage‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖+24% Psychosis‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced and harmful effects increased if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.feniterpulmonaryagentc:
A blood diuretic used to treat heavy pulmonary agent buildup and lung damage from blistering agents. Only effective against pulmonary agents before symptoms show.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-50% Pulmonary Agent Buildup‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-40% Blistering Agent Exposure‖color:end‖ ‖color:245,105,105,255‖Only effective against pulmonary agent below 50% buildup.‖color:end‖

A blood diuretic used to treat pulmonary agent buildup. Effective for a while even after symptoms appear.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-60% Pulmonary Agent Buildup‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Harmful effects applied if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.feniterpsychoagentcure:
A blood diuretic used to treat psychochemical agent exposure. Shuts down the central nervous system as well as causing extreme drowsiness.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-125% Psychochemical Agent Exposure‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖-75% Hallucinating‖color:end‖ ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-75% Psychosis‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced and harmful effects increased if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.feniterdecontaminant:
A cleaning mixture of primarily ethanol, extremely effective in cleaning dangerous chemicals off of the skin and clothes.
On Use: ‖color:154,213,163,255‖-900% Chemical Contamination‖color:end‖ ‖color:243,162,50,255‖(Healing reduced if skill requirement not met.)‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.foldingsurgerytable: A folding surgical table used in the event of missing a hospital bed.
Override.entitydescription.basebionic: A bionic contraption to mimic the function of a normal human organ, can be used to replace missing organs. Mostly used to create complex bionic organs with new functions to offer to the body.
Override.entitydescription.adrenalinebionic: A bionic organ designed to produce advanced and alien variations of natural hormones to increase body performance.
Override.entitydescription.methbionic: An experimental bionic organ designed to produce stimulants like methamphetamine. Do not ingest alcohol while in body.
Override.entitydescription.gillsbionic: A bionic organ designed to allow the supply of oxygen underwater. Does not protect against pressure.
Override.entitydescription.mechanitebionic: A bionic organ designed to produce nanomachines (called mechanites) that support and strengthen the empidermis to protect from barotrauma.
Override.entitydescription.calyxanidebionic: An experimental bionic organ designed to produce calyxanide in the system, sort of like a husk vaccine. Shunned by the church of the husk.
Override.entitydescription.bloodbionic: A bionic organ designed to transmutate any alien or foreign blood efficiently into usable human blood.
Override.entitydescription.doctorsuniform3: Makes you look like you might be useful if your forged medical degree didn't already show that.
